item.description: We start around 8 and spend some time throwing and learning names. We'll split up into games after a bit and play until 10ish. Then we head out for snacks (it's going to be warm, so possibly ice cream) so you can chat with your teammates, opponents, and super-stinky organizers in the light. Then we go home, and it's super-sad, because we have to wait a whole THREE DAYS before we see each other again. On the plus side, Jim and Amy might take that time to shower.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the coolest (and probably only) people on Cambridge Common, over by the softball field, tossing an Illuminated Frisbee. (Also, the smell.)
item.why: Because we're awesomely fantastically fun, despite the stench (and because we might kill Kelli, despite her being helpful and writing this invitation for our slacker, stinky selves).
item.name: Tuesday Night Frisbee Fun
